config.question: The uprising in 1763 among western Indians who had been French allies and hated the British was known as __________.

answer_3.response: Pontiac coordinated an uprising among the western Indians who had been French allies and hated the British—even those sent to protect them from land-grabbing colonists. This formidable Native American resistance was known as Pontiac’s Rebellion.
